DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy two different dos intravenous ( IV ) granisetron prevention postspinal shiver cesarean section , comparison IV pethidine placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Spinal Induced Shivering During CS
DOC.detailed_description: The study include four group follow : 1 . Granisetron1 group : woman receive 1mg IV granisetron 2 . Granisetron 0.7 group : woman receive 0.7 mg IV granisetron 3 . Pethidine group : woman receive 25 mg IV pethidine 4 . Control group : woman receive 2 ml 0.9 % sodium chloride . Throughout study period , shiver score , core temperature , sensory level motor block record , heart rate measure continuously use electrocardiogram ; blood pressure determine . If heart rate decrease 20 % baseline atropin receive blood pressure decrease 20 % baseline ephedrine receive . Also , Apgar score one minute five minute record . At end patient satisfaction assess use Verbal Numeric Scoring system Side effect ( bradycardia , hypotension , hypothermia , nausea vomiting , pruritus etc ) record perioperatively operate room postanesthetic care unit .
